skill.name: move_forward
skill.description: Move the mobile robot forward a desired distance in a desired time.

states.name: starting
states.action: Prepare the system to begin moving the robot forward.

states.name: execute
states.action: Set the velocity of the robot to a calculated value for the desired time. If the calculated velocity exceeds the maximum velocity, set the maximum velocity and calculate the new time necessary to travel the desired distance.

states.name: completing
states.action: Print the current velocity of the robot and the traveled distance and time.

states.name: stopping
states.action: Set the velocity of the robot to zero.

states.name: resetting
states.action: Shut down processes used to move the robot.
